mapper.sql: id, interface_name, status, error_msg, elapsed_time, user_defined1, user_defined2, user_defined3, user_defined4, user_defined5, gmt_create, gmt_end

where 1=1
and interface_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.interfaceName},'%')
and status LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.status},'%')
and error_msg LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.errorMsg},'%')
and elapsed_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.elapsedTime},'%')
and gmt_create LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.gmtCreate},'%')
and gmt_end LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.gmtEnd},'%')
mapper.insert:
insert into wms_interface_call_log
id,
interface_name,
status,
error_msg,
elapsed_time,
user_defined1,
user_defined2,
user_defined3,
user_defined4,
user_defined5,
gmt_create,
gmt_end,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{interfaceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{errorMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{elapsedTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{userDefined1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userDefined2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userDefined3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userDefined4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userDefined5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{gmtEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update wms_interface_call_log
interface_name = #{interfaceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
error_msg = #{errorMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
elapsed_time = #{elapsedTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_defined1 = #{userDefined1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_defined2 = #{userDefined2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_defined3 = #{userDefined3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_defined4 = #{userDefined4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_defined5 = #{userDefined5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_end = #{gmtEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update wms_interface_call_log set interface_name = #{interfaceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, error_msg = #{errorMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, elapsed_time = #{elapsedTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_defined1 = #{userDefined1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_defined2 = #{userDefined2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_defined3 = #{userDefined3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_defined4 = #{userDefined4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_defined5 = #{userDefined5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_end = #{gmtEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
